name: choo-fullstack
description: Using choo as a fullstack nodejs application. Support SSR
author: Aris Riswanto

scripts.dev: rimraf public/parcel && parcel serve app/index.js --no-source-maps --dist-dir public/parcel --public-url /parcel --cache-dir node_modules/.parcel-cache --port 3000
scripts.build: rimraf public/parcel && parcel build app/index.js --no-source-maps --dist-dir public/parcel --public-url /parcel --cache-dir node_modules/.parcel-cache
